channel.title: Webhosting!
channel.description:
Hi!
I know there is a sticky but its just a sticky and I'm looking for specific reviews/discussion re: What is the best webhosting in your oppinion for my requirements? Bandwitdh, restrictions, hidden fees?
my main requirements are: PHP, MySQL, bandwidth (anywhere from 100MB - 4/5 gigs... 10 gigs during 1 month in the entire year), preferably able to execute scripts quick (unlike some hosts where they bog down processing speeds)
I recently am hosting with BlueHost $68 CAD I got 2 years of "unlimited" bandwidth and pretty much everything, but with recent research on the host I have found some pretty bad reviews which I have not personally experienced myself such as "5000 file limit" or long down times so has anyone else used this host and have a review? I guess I think the reviews in google maybe written by bluehost's competitors..
What are some of the hosts you've used and would recommend for my second site? It's less of a site and more of a play zone for me to develop things/test things after they're developed and tested on my local server.
SO: [b]What do YOU recommend and Why?[/b]

item.title: Webhosting!
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Terrible, widely known for having the worst support in existence.

Read full topic

item.title: Webhosting!
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

What do you guys reckon about 1and1? I used to use them for domains without any problems, but how is their hosting?

Read full topic

item.title: Webhosting!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

LunarPages for a shared host

Read full topic

item.title: Webhosting!
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

ive used a couple “unlimited” i never go over 10gigs bandwidth and 2gig storage so ive been fine

Read full topic

item.title: Webhosting!
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:2, topic:401071”]I recommend staying far away from anybody who advertises “unlimited” anything.[/quote]Well I used once on an “unlimited”, 1TB of HDD and ~500GB bandwidth but was never yelled at.

Read full topic
